events.name: Set Throttle Target
events.description: Set the target throttle for all engines (regardless of stage) that match a name

data_needed.prompt: Select an engine from the list:
Enter the selected engine type’s throttle setting at Event end time:

events.name: Set Target Throttle By Stage
events.description: Set the target throttle for all engines that match a name in a given stage

data_needed.prompt: Select an engine from the list:
Select a stage from the list:
Enter the selected engine type’s throttle setting at Event end time:
Select a stage from the list:

events.name: Giveback V Vert
events.description: Select a V Vert giveback target and time to start reducing V vert.

data_needed.prompt: Enter the giveback target V vert in fps (typically 1200fps):
